title: HAP 68 - The Problem of the Color Line - Introducing the Twentieth Century
itunes:title: HAP 68 - The Problem of the Color Line - Introducing the Twentieth Century
description: By exploring the work and activities of W.E.B. Du Bois around the turn of the twentieth century, we introduce some of the themes of our coverage of that century.
